title: Mangroves and Monsters
description: Yep, you can read it FREE with Kindle Unlimited!Charles Cooper Raison never intended to fall in love. He didn't need the hassle or the heartache, and emotional hang-ups brought plenty of both. He had learned that life lesson well enough from his bastard of a grandfather. Then he stood in for Angeline St. Cyr's driver during her New Orleans photo shoot, fell insanely in love with the supermodel - and she died on him! Or did she? Cooper's gut says no. Life lesson #2: trust your gut. For five long years his love has survived while he searches for Angeline. Will finding her on the Caribbean island of Jacqueme Dominique cost Cooper his life?
author: Sharon C. Pennington
